org.apache.plc4x.java.base.protocol

Class SingleItemToSingleRequestProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.ChannelDuplexHandler
          • org.apache.plc4x.java.base.protocol.SingleItemToSingleRequestProtocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandler

    public class SingleItemToSingleRequestProtocol
extends io.netty.channel.ChannelDuplexHandler
    This layer can be used to split a PlcRequest which addresses multiple PlcFields into multiple subsequent PlcRequests.
